main_definition: To move or change from one place, position, person, or condition to another.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of money and finances, transferred means moving funds from one account to another. For example: 'I transferred $500 from my savings account to my checking account.'
meanings_and_examples.example: 'After receiving a bonus at work, John decided to transfer $2000 into his retirement fund.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of communication or information, transferred means moving ideas, knowledge, or data from one source to another. For example: 'The teacher transferred her expertise on American history by sharing stories and facts with her students.'
meanings_and_examples.example: 'During a presentation, the speaker used various visuals to effectively transfer key points about climate change to the audience.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of employment or responsibilities, transferred means changing one's job role, position, or duties. For example: 'After working in marketing for several years, she decided to transfer her skills into a new sales management position.'
meanings_and_examples.example: 'The company promoted him from an entry-level position and he was transferred to the customer service department.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: In transportation or logistics, transferred means moving goods or belongings from one location to another. For example: 'After renovating her apartment, Emily had all of her furniture transferred by movers to her new home.'
meanings_and_examples.example: 'The shipping company was responsible for transferring packages between warehouses and distribution centers across the country.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: In personal relationships or connections, transferred means moving emotional energy or affection from one relationship to another. For example: 'After their marriage ended, she transferred her love for him into a close friendship with his sister.'
meanings_and_examples.example: 'Having lost touch with his old friends after relocating, he found himself transferring some of his time and attention towards making new connections in the city.'
